topic.title: Getting started
topic.p: This section helps you familiarize with %product%.
About %product% briefly describes the components %product% is built upon. Start with this page if you have zero knowledge about it.
Jump to the Quickstart page in case you want to run %product% and see the immediate results of your code inspection.
The Concepts section outlines the basic definitions %product% is build upon, such as static analysis, code inspections, and linters.
